features: Soothing Nutrition: Modeled after the complete nutrition and gentleness of breastmilk, this formula offers nutrition for babies up to 12 months experiencing colic, excessive crying, fussiness and gas

Probiotic Formula: Good Start Soothe formula features prebiotics, Comfort Proteins and probiotics that improve the good bacteria in tummies and promote soft stools; It's our closest formula to breastmilk
Give Your Baby a Good Start: Your baby’s nutritional needs evolve over time. That's why we created the Gerber Good Start line. Made to comfort your baby's tummy and available in a range of products
Wholesome Options: Introduce your infant to complimentary staged products like single grain Cereals and 1st Foods fruit and veggie purees with Gerber infant formulas, probiotic supplements and more

Nutrition For Growing: Like your baby, we're always growing and learning. More than ever we're committed to being your partner in parenthood with quality ingredients, nutritious food and expert guidance
body.description: Gerber good start soothe formula is designed for babies experiencing excessive crying and colic, fussiness, gas, and mild spit-up. Gerber Good Start Infant Formula is the only formula with HMO* (human milk oligosaccarides) and probiotics. Research has shown that hmos support digestive health and the developing immune system. Gerber good start soothe formula has exclusive comforting probiotic L reuteri which has been clinically shown to reduce crying time in colicky babies. (Not from Human milk).

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Nourishing formula to nurture your little one Happy tummy, happy baby Gerber Good Start SoothePro Formula is made with probiotic L. reuteri and HMO* to provide extra comfort for babies experiencing excessive crying, fussiness, colic, and gas as well as support their digestive health and developing immune system. *Human Milk Oligosaccharide. Not from human milk. The good stuff inside Our formula offers complete nutrition for your growing baby, modeled after the gentleness of breastmilk with HMO*. It also is non-GMO** and made with no artificial growth hormones***. **Not made with genetically engineered ingredients. ***No significant difference has been shown between milk derived from rbST-treated and non rbST-treated cows. DHA & Comfort Proteins Gerber Good Start SoothePro Formula has expert-recommended DHA to support healthy brain and eye development, and small, easy-to-digest Comfort Proteins to help provide comfort for your little one’s tummy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The only thing that worked for my colicky baby
reviews.reviewText: Ok, so my daughter is now 4 but I have been telling everyone about this formula since we switched when she was an infant. We tried what felt like every formula for our daughter but had the same results- crying for what felt like hours and generally fussy. (I was only using the formula to supplement, so it was very evident that the formula was the issue when my daughter became fussy after a bottle.) This formula (formally Carnation) had been suggested to me by multiple people prior to giving birth who had colicky babies. We tried it and never looked back. With my second, I never even tried the other brands and just went directly to their Everyday Probiotic on the first shot- again only supplementing about a canister in one month.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Helps her go #2
reviews.reviewText: This is the only formula I used for all 4 of my kids, and now my daughter is sing it for her own child. She switched due to my recommendation of this formula as the baby had trouble going #2. This cleared that up pretty quickly after the switch and now she goes regularly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Found out my newborn has acid reflux
reviews.reviewText: I use a.r. Formula now because I discovered my baby has acid reflux. This is a really good second option though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this formula. At first my twins was using enfamil & enfamil gentlease but I noticed they was getting gassy and spitting up a lot so I wanted to try a different formula & this is the one I tried. Ever since we started using it they started feeling way better no more gassiness and haven’t been spitting up the way they was before. I am a mother of 5 so with my other three kids I used enfamil so I was so surprised that with my twins it didn’t agree after awhile.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 21, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So far so good!
reviews.reviewText: We were using Similac total comfort but our can had just gotten recalled. My pediatrician recommended this for as a substitute and I’ll have to say I don’t think we will be switching back. First for the same price you get twice the amount which I was not expecting. I like how it opens and seals shut. I find that this formula is not only gentle on my babies tummy but mixes really well! Hardly any bubbles when you mix and doesn’t leave clumps (yes I add my water in first before I add the formula). With the Similac I had to wait a few minutes for all the bubbles to dissolve. So far my baby hasn’t been upset by the transition which is good!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought this when the stores near me was sold out and its the only one that doesn't make my daughter spit up alot. It was very convenient and i love that it came in a bigger size then the ones i buy at the store.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Baby gerber Soothe
reviews.reviewText: My baby drinks it pretty quick. It is a great size for the price. Since we started feeding our baby gerber Soothe she has been less fussy and not constipated no more. She is way more relaxed and chill. My baby is more playful and less uncomfortable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good product wrong size
reviews.reviewText: Gerber soothe really helped my daughter so i have no bad reviews regarding the product. What i had an issue was with the fact i paid 32.49 for the 30oz cans and got the 19oz instead. Now i cant order the 30oz can bc of the limit. Luckily i was refunded but still.... send the right size at least.
